modName: A Travelers Guide - Touring Carriages Guide Book and Map
summary: A simple guide book and map have been added to a chest at the Whiterun Stables next to the Touring Carriages map.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][u]A Traveler's Guide:[/u][/b][/size]
[size=4][b][u]Traveling Skyrim by Carriage[/u][/b][/size]


Description:

Do you love traveling the world?
Do you NEED to know where you are going at all times?

Then look no further than your friendly Traveler's Guide Skyrim Carriage edition Volume 1.
Includes a roll out map for quick reference!


A guide book listing all the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38529/?]Touring Carriages[/url] destinations your
carriage driver will take you.

In addition, a handy map has been provided so you can quickly glance at the main carriage routes from your inventory.

Both items have been added to a chest at the Whiterun Stables next to the Touring Carriages map.


Requirements:
[list]
[*]None
[*]Touring Carriages is recommended. Why would you need a guide book without it?
[/list]

Recommended Load Order:
[list]
[*]After TouringCarriages.esp
[/list]

Cleaned using TES5Edit 3.0.31

Permissions:
Unless otherwise noted all assets were created or modified from Creative Commons licensed works and are free to use with attribution given to the respective owner.
You may not repost this package on any other site.

Comments and construction criticism is always welcome.

[/list]
author: xanthumn

files.changelogHtml: Added driver names to the guide book
